content: Hello Potion Seller, I am going into battle and I want your strongest potions. Potion Seller, I tell you I am going into battle, and I want only your strongest potions.

stories.story: The knight proudly consumed the potion and immediately after hair started growing magnificently out of his chin forming a luscious beard. Unfortunately, the knight, still not used to his new locks, charged recklessly into battle, the beard getting tangled in their armor and snared on other people's armor. Word spread of the knight who tripped over his own beard, and soon every barber shop was filled with people asking for shorter beard styles.
stories.revealText: Traveler knight consumed this potion and started growing a magnificent beard.

stories.story: The knight drank the potion and immediately let out a perfect replica of the enemy's battle cries. Their loud cry rallied the enemy forces and gave away his own position. They quickly charged and poopy-di scoop scoop-diddy whoop whoop-di-scoop-di-poop poop-di-scoopty scoopty-whoop whoopity-scoop, whoop-poop poop-diddy, whoop-scoop poop, poop scoop-diddy-whoop whoop-diddy-scoopy whoop-diddy-scoop, poop
stories.revealText: The traveling knight got beat up when he used this potion and was able to imitate another person perfectly. But watching the knight get poopity-scooped gave you the idea that maybe this potion could open the doors to a successful rap career if you choose to go down that road.

stories.story: The knight drank the potion and suddenly he could understand the birds chirping in the forest. They were gossiping about the enemy's battle plans. However, the knight, not being very smart, couldn't keep up with the speed of the gossip and kept getting lost in all the side tangents in the stories. Eventually he wandered straight into the enemy army's camp clutching his head like a duck with a headache.
stories.revealText: When someone says to you 'a little bird told me' this potion helped them understand the little bird.

stories.story: Potion seller. I went face my demons armed with your strongest potion. I stared at them with my most ferocious stare and drank the potion, never breaking eye contact. Well, they weren't really looking at me, but I was looking at them. And I didn't blink. However, drinking the potion just made them ignore me better. The potion turned me invisible! All my toes got trampled.
stories.revealText: There was a traveling knight that made me realize that some people just seem to blend into the background naturally, but for the others, this potion should turn them invisible.

stories.story: You tried to watch the knight through your glass ball, but it seemed you were a little late in tuning in and the knight had already drank the potion. Currently your crystal ball was just showing you clouds billowing around no matter how hard to tried to get a clearer picture. You're not really sure what this is about or why your ball was so cloudy.

When you used your crystal ball to check how the knight was doing after drinking the potion you were just greeted with a black void. Did your crystal ball get unplugged? But your crystal ball doesn't use electricity. And there is no electricity here. The more you think, the more your head gets filled with confusing thoughts. Bedge time, you think.

The knight drank the potion and immediately felt power surging through his legs. 'ONCE A BANDLE GUNNER, ALWAYS A BANDLE GUNNER!' he yelled as the knight catapulted in like a big rock. However, the knight, clearly lacking in foresight, landed right in the middle of the enemy formation, surrounded and overwhelmed.
stories.revealText: Seems like this potion may make people prone to sending it with a big jump

stories.story: The knight drank the potion, and it seemed nothing had happened. He looked the same as ever, clad head to toe in armor like he might have been compensating for something. After a bit longer of seeing no change, you left to go eat some food.

The knight drank the potion and immediately his eyes began darting around. 'The trees' he said 'the trees are speaking'.  This fact seemed to really mess with the knights brain. You're not sure if his sanity will come back.
stories.revealText: The trees will speak apparently

stories.story: I told this traveler 'my potions are too strong for you'. I had warned him, 'my strongest potions are only for the strongest and you clearly are not of the strongest, you're clearly the weakest'. I can give any potion, but if one does not have the mind or fortitude to use them, the potions will not help. This traveler took my potion and let out a fart so large and so powerful that he imploded in on himself and must have teleported to a new dimension or something. I will give myself a 3 star rating for teaching such a valuable lesson.
stories.revealText: This potion is my pride and joy. A super large fart.

stories.story: The knight took the potion and immediately a stain began forming under his feet. As the knight walked around the stain spread to where ever he walked. As the knight approached the long awaited battle, the enemies quickly realize this quirk from their opponent. Seeing this they quickly changed their battle plan and started luring the knight along a very peculiar path. By the end of the battle, there seemed to be a cryptic message left on the battlefield. The potion seller needed to zoom out on his crystal ball to see the full message: 'send beautiful renaissance painting' it said.
stories.revealText: Can use human as paintbrush to write messages or draw with this potion

stories.story: The knight took the potion and waved his arms around. The knight was acting strange, but you couldn't really tell anything too different about him.

As he stood in front of the enemy, the knight drank the potion and was immediately compelled to yell 'YO MAMA' at the top of his lungs. As he bellow the ground shook forming an earthquake that shook everyone. It felt like something with a very large mass had hit the ground. After the ground stopped shaking the enemy quipped back 'I know you are, but what am I'. It didn't make much sense to you, but the knight seemed devastated
stories.reveal: The knight said Yo mama makes a big earthquake

stories.story: After drinking the potion, the knight held his hands up and with the powers of the potion summoned a giant sandstorm. The stupid sandstorm made the visibility so bad, so you couldn't see what else happened but at least you knew that this potion gave the power to summon sandstorms. And despite the low visibility, you could safely assume that the knight was not succeeding in fighting his battle. He always seemed to be a failure.
stories.revealText: The knight used this to summon an earthquake

stories.story: After taking the potion, the knight seemed to just start tripping over himself. Maybe his suit of armor was limiting his movements? You could tell that your potion was doing something, but what exactly you weren't sure.

The knight drank the potion and let out a shrill something that made your ears bleed. You could not keep watching for the health of your auditory channels. With your hands over your ears you left the room and the crystal ball as quickly and you could.

The knight drank the potion and began staring intently at the ground. This knight did not move for 10 mins. Soon you grew bored and started doing chores. When you finally came back a couple hours later you noticed that the knight had spent the time sorting grains of dirt.
stories.revealText: After observing the knight you learned that this potion gives people to super power find prolonged interest in even the most mundane things. And maybe there is beauty in that.

stories.story: The knight took the potion and maybe seemed to grow taller? You couldn't really tell from this angle. The suit of armor was also making it difficult to see anything.

The knight drank the potion and was immediately buried by a bunch of rocks. The potion definitely had something to do with rocks, but this knight didn't seem to be a very good test subject for this potion.
The knight drank the potion and used his hands to summon a ball of light. And then he just looked at the light, like a moth to a flame or a moth to a light. This knight might as well be a moth.
stories.revealText: The knight was drawn to the summoned ball of light like a moth to a ball of light

defaultMessage: Oops. You seemed to have completely slept through when the potion was used. Too bad your crystal ball doesn't have a replay option.

content: There's something haunting the graveyard by the pond that I like to fish in. Every time I go fishing now, I keep catching boots. It's the same old soggy boot, always the left shoe. I can't escape it and I can't catch any fish. Please give me a super power to escape this boot curse.

stories.story: The fisher eagerly consumed the strange concoction. A beard quickly grew out from their face. The beard really helped the fisher look more like an experienced fisher. You can't really remember why this fisher came to you in the first place, but you consider this change in appearance to be a success.
stories.revealText: Fishermen and fisherwomen look like they catch more fish with a beard and this potion helps with that. I should note this down as a marketing opportunity

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast the line, and then sat down. Nothing else interesting seemed to happen, but they did seem successful in catching fish. Every once in a while the fisher would move their mouth strangely and make some gurgling noises. You've seen people try to clear their throats in similar ways, but you're not one to judge. Especially since you're watching secretly.

The fisher drank the potion before casting the line and sitting down. After a bit a cat came around to check out what the fisher was up to. Realizing that the potion gave the ability to talk to animals, the fisher offered the cat a fish and they began chatting. These two hung out for so long that you could feel your jealousy building up.The fisher was still catching boots, but he didn't seem to mind so much.
stories.revealText: Next time you make a potion to talk to animals, you need to use it yourself. Cats are too cute.

stories.story: The fisher downed the potion and immediately turned invisible. Now you were just looking at a boring scene of a still lake. Maybe you could use this time to paint.
stories.revealText: Nature is nice, although a little boring. But actually, you never know if an artist painted an invisible interesting human in a nature painting.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast his line, and then sat down. Nothing else of interest seemed to be happening.

The fisher consumed the potion and proceeded to fish. After minutes it looked like something caught on the line! You watched as the fisher reeled it in and was astonished that it was indeed a boot. The fisher took one look at the boot and then immediately and violently erased to boot from existence. You looked in awe as the fisher did this to the surprisingly many boots that were reeled in. You didn't seem to be able to help the fisher get less boots, but the fisher did seem to get enjoyment out of each boot that was poofed out of existence.
stories.revealText: When life gives you lemons, have the super power to destroy matter and erase the lemons from existence. This should be a good stress reliever.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast his line, and then sat down. Nothing else of interest seemed to be happening.

The fisher took a swig of the murky potion, and immediately all of their hair shed from their body. You had to look away as looking at the hairless creature felt like a violation for your eyes. You considered packing up and moving as well so the fisher wouldn't be able to complain to you. But then again, they probably wouldn't be able to step outside anyways so you were probably safe.
stories.revealText: Hair looks good on some people and no hair looks good on some people. Some people really need hair though.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion and started fishing. Pretty soon the fisher started tilting their head around as if they could hear something. It was the algae in the water! The potion allowed the fisher to understand the algae and soon the fisher was animatedly conversing with the algae. How interesting, algae seems to know so much gossip.
stories.revealText: Algae is plants too and this potion does allow you to speak with algae. Not sea pigs though. Those are animals.

stories.story: The fisherman downed the potion and immediately let out a fart so big and powerful it caused waves on the lake's surface. Bit by bit, belly-side up fish began appearing on the surface. Did any wildlife survive the giant outburst of methane gas? The loud noise, poisonous air, and unpleasant smell also seemed to draw out a nearby ghost who hurriedly scrambled away, looking like it would never return.
stories.revealText: It seems that ghosts can smell farts from this potion too.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast the line, and sat down to fish for so long that it looked like they were melting into their chair, becoming a puddle. You could have sworn that there was actually goo forming underneath that fisher, but that could have been your eye boogers from staring at a still image for too long. You decided it was time to rest your eyes.

The fisher eyed the potion with suspicion, but still drank the potion. The fisher shook their hand violently, and as you heard the sound of their knuckles cracking, their fingers began glowing brightly. The fingers illuminated the murky depths. The source of the curse was revealed! A grumpy spectral washerwoman was churning out an endless supply of left boots in her underwater washing machine. The fisher, armed with knowledge, stared at the water with their mouth agape. After a few moments they sat back down and cast the line and if they were seeing nothing.
stories.revealText: This potion gives your fingers the power to illuminate and help you see things that you couldn't see before. But sometimes, it's better to un-see.

stories.story: The fisherman chugged the dubious concoction. The pond rippled violently, causing him to lose his balance and fall in. He sputtered to the surface, a boot clinging to his fishing line like a leech. The ghost from the graveyard, startled by the commotion, looked down and shrieked. Distracted, she tripped and fell into her own washing machine, vanishing in a puff of steam. The curse was broken, but the fisherman was left shivering and sopping wet, with a boot and a newfound appreciation for a calm pond.
stories.revealText: I'm not really sure what I just saw in the crystal ball, but there was definitely an earthquake.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion and sat down. Soon a sandstorm started forming around him. Startled, the fisherman threw the rest of the potion in the water and left looking a bit disappointed to leave the nice, picturesque fishing spot.
stories.revealText: There's a time and place for everything, including sandstorms.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast his line, and then sat down. Nothing else of interest seemed to be happening.

The fisher eyed the potion nervously before taking a sip. A mermaid came out of the water and bonked the fisher on the head. The fisher fainted, and the mermaid stole the potion. You watched in amazement as the mermaid drank the potion and immediately gave the concert of a lifetime hitting high notes that you had never heard before.
stories.revealText: Mermaid concerts go hard. Especially with this potion increasing their range.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, cast his line, and stared intently at the water. The behavior didn't seem that far off what you'd expect from a fisher.

The fisher drank the potion and immediately turned into the most glorious person you had ever laid your eyes on. Flowing golden hair, chiseled muscles, and beauty everywhere. People say there are many fish in the sea, but none are like this fisher.
stories.revealText: Most of the fish in the sea are ugly. Especially the deep sea fish, have you seen those? This potion makes people so beautiful that I am reminded how many ugly people there are.

stories.story: The fisher drank the potion, stared at the water, seemed to have a lightbulb moment, and put the fishing rod down. Instead the fisher used their newfound super powers to control the water to remove fish from the water. They even conjured up wind to dry the fish and fire to cook the fish. I guess the fisher doesn't need to worry about books when they can control the elements.
stories.revealText: Fishing is so easy when you can control the water, and being able to control fire helps with spontaneous cooking too.

stories.story: The fisher, with a sigh, drank the potion. With their new powers, they materialized a ball of light at the tip of his fishing rod. Casting the line, the illuminated bobber attracted a giant school of fish. The fisher reeled in a fish after fish, not catching a single boot. The ghost peeked over the gravestone, confused and defeated. The fisherman now had a new reliable way of catching fish. He didn't need the boot anymore, so he decided to give it to you as a token of his appreciation.
stories.rewardText: You have received a soggy old boot as a token of the fisher's appreciation.

defaultMessage: The fisherman never got back to you about how the potion worked. Oh well, maybe he'll go seeking you out for the solution again.

content: I've been told to escort Escia to Tobbek tomorrow, and I am so nervous. I need this mission to be a success, so I can make a good impression on Escia. Please give me a power that will guarantee this mission's success.

stories.story: Desperate for success, the escort downed the potion. Overnight, a thick beard sprouted on their face.  The journey was unexpectedly peaceful until a band of ogres ambushed them.  The escort, surprised but emboldened by their new beard, roared a challenge.  Startled by the unexpected ferocity, the ogres hesitated, giving the escort enough time to unleash a flurry of blows, sending them fleeing.
stories.revealText: The superpower to grow beards can be intimidating.

stories.story: The first day of the travels was uneventful. On the second day, a pack of goblins ambushed them.  The escort, mimicked the particularly loud and obnoxious goblin leader, sowed confusion among the attackers.  Taking advantage of the chaos, the escort fought their way through the goblins, escaping unharmed. Honestly, you saw a lot, but you're also not really sure what you saw.

Hoping to anticipate dangers, the escort chugged the potion. They learned of a hidden bandit camp ahead.  Using their newfound knowledge, the escort devised a daring plan.  They snuck past the perimeter guards, mimicking the calls of a nocturnal bird to distract the lookouts.  Inside the camp, the escort freed the prisoners and sparked a rebellion.  The bandits were overwhelmed, and the camp was liberated.
stories.revealText: Ca-Caw. People never think that other people could be making bird calls.

stories.story: Dreaming of a smooth journey, the escort downed Tom's Potion. They soon realized that this potion gave them the power to turn invisible. Knowing this, the escort immediately snuck over to try to peep into Escia's tent. You started feeling uncomfortable about this, so instead you scrolled on your crystal ball to watch something else.
stories.revealText: Some people are so sketchy. Especially when given the power of invisibility. You take note that perhaps you need to be more careful with whom you give this potion.

stories.story: Dreaming of a swift journey, the escort drank the potion. It was very quickly apparent that the potion gave the power of flight. Soaring through the air, they spotted a column of smoke rising in the distance. Investigating, they found a village under attack by a fire-breathing dragon. The escort, without hesitation, swooped down and engaged the beast in a fierce aerial battle. Dodging flames and scorching winds, the escort managed to slay the dragon, saving the village. They landed in Tobbek a hero, and Escia seemed pretty in awe of the escort as well. Happily, the escort visited you later and handed you a dragon scale.
stories.revealText: Flying is pretty cool
stories.rewardText: You received a Dragon Scale from the nervous escort

stories.story: Hoping to impress, the escort consumed the potion. The escort soon realized that the potion gave the power to conjure up matter. The journey was smooth, with the escort shaping bridges and clearing paths.  Then, the earth trembled violently.  A monstrous earthworm, awakened by the magic, erupted from the ground.  The escort, thinking fast, used their power to reshape the landscape, creating a series of trenches and earthworks to trap the beast.  In a grueling battle, the escort used their environment to their advantage, finally defeating the earthworm and ensuring the safety of the region.
stories.revealText: Nothing can stand in your way if you have the power to destroy and create matter.

stories.story: Honestly I was too tired, and went to sleep. I have no idea what happened and my brain cannot think anymore.

Hoping for a clean and easy journey, the escort drank a strange potion.  Looking down, they realized the potion had caused them to lose all their hair!  Escia, initially surprised, found their bald head oddly endearing.  Despite the embarrassing situation, the journey continued, and the escort arrived in Tobbek, a little self-conscious but heartened that people didn't judge based on appearance.
stories.revealText: Baldness is endearing. Your potion gives the power to immediately be bald. With the transitive property, this means that you should immediately be endearing.

stories.story: The escort drank the potion. They spent the journey conversing with the local wildlife, learning about hidden dangers and forgotten paths.  One day, they encountered a distressed herd of deer fleeing in terror.  Following their tracks, the escort discovered a group of monstrous wolves attacking a hidden village.  The escort, using their newfound ability to communicate with animals, rallied the deer and other forest creatures to defend the village.  In a fierce battle, the beasts drove back the wolves, saving the villagers.  The escort came by to give the head of one of their new deer friends that died in battle as a thanks.
stories.rewardText: You received a deer head from the nervous escort. Apparently this deer used to be their friend.

stories.story: Hoping to lighten the mood, the escort drank the strange potion. The escort did not seem to have very much control over their new powers as they could not stop farting. At first, Escia tried to be cordial and understanding about the constant farts, but the constant barrage of smelly blasts quickly became overwhelming. It was a cold night, so windows could only be opened in short intervals. At one point the escort dropped a huge fart, and Escia had to bring her beer to the toilet so she could breathe. The rest of the journey was a struggle.
stories.revealText: Small things can build up quickly with much repetition. Like the super power of farts from this potion.

stories.story: Hoping to avoid detection by bandits, the escort drank a strange potion. The potion caused them to leave behind a trail of sticky goo wherever they sat. The journey was messy, with the escort constantly sticking to rocks, logs, and even Escia's saddle.  They managed to avoid bandits, but arrived in Tobbek looking like a disaster.
stories.revealText: Snail trail stains and goo are very difficult to clean.

stories.story: Hoping to appear confident and strong, the escort drank a strange potion. The potion caused their knuckles to crackle with glowing light whenever they flexed.  Escia found the glowing hands a bit strange, but the display of power was somewhat reassuring.  The journey was uneventful, and the escort arrived in Tobbek with glowing knuckles and a newfound sense of self-assurance.
stories.revealText: OooooooOoooOo light

stories.story: Hoping to clear a path through any obstacles, the escort drank a strange potion. The ground rumbled ominously, and Escia clung to her horse in fear.  Thankfully, there were no obstacles on the path, but the constant tremors made the journey miserable.  The escort arrived in Tobbek, covered in dust and thoroughly shaken, having achieved nothing but a bumpy ride.

Hoping to create a diversion if needed, the escort drank a strange potion. A swirling sandstorm erupted around them, blinding and disorienting.  Escia became separated from the escort in the chaos, and they spent a frantic hour searching for each other.  The storm eventually subsided, and they were lucky to reunite.  The journey was delayed, and they arrived in Tobbek exhausted and frustrated.
stories.revealText: The power of sandstorms from this potion decrease visibility.

stories.story: Hoping to impress Escia with their skills, the escort drank a strange potion. They felt a surge of energy and performed a series of acrobatic feats, much to Escia's amusement.  However, their newfound agility proved useless on the journey.  The escort arrived in Tobbek, slightly out of breath and covered in dirt, having achieved nothing but a brief display of acrobatics.
stories.revealText: The power to run super fast is kind of cool, but there are cooler super powers.

stories.story: Hoping to impress Escia with their skills, the escort drank a strange potion. The escort suddenly decided to be a bard and sang his heart out hitting high notes he could never dream of hitting before.  Initially everyone was impressed with his new vocal range, but it soon became clear that high notes did not equate to greater vocal ability and instead word spread of a traveling shrieker.
stories.revealText: This potion has great potential in creating beauty and horror depending on who sings the high notes.

stories.story: Hoping to impress Escia with their skills, the escort drank a strange potion. They fixated on the wheels of the caravan and nobody could get the escort's attention back.
stories.revealText: The wheels on the bus go round and round. Round and Round. round and round. round and Round. Round and round.

stories.story: The escort drank a strange potion and immediately became the most muscular and handsome person. Escia fell for him immediately. Later on the escort wrote a letter to you thanking you for his newfound beauty, muscles and face. Attached to his letter was a rose.
stories.rewardText: You received a Rose from the escort. You think that maybe their beauty may have gone to their head. You're not the biggest fan of roses, but you'll find a place to keep the rose.

stories.story: Hoping to overcome any obstacles with a touch of magic, the escort drank a strange potion that granted them incredible power to control the elements. The potion coursed through their veins, granting them incredible power over the elements. However, controlling the power proved difficult. The escort accidentally uprooted a tree while trying to swat a fly with a gust of wind, and tripped over their own feet while attempting to manipulate the earth to form a path. Escia quickly became concerned about the escort's safety and clumsiness. The escort arrived in Tobbek exhausted and sore, having achieved nothing but a spectacular display of uncontrolled elemental chaos
stories.revealText: Many people hang a long way to go before mastering the elements. But I believe Aang can save the world.

stories.story: The escort drank the potion and there was a ball of light. Nice.
stories.revealText: Wow a ball of light

defaultMessage: You didn't get any news from the escort. Maybe he'll come to you again with his problems and you can find out more.

content: My prized possession, a golden locket that's been in my family for generations, has gone missing! I believe a mischievous sprite has taken it and hidden it somewhere in the forest. Please help me find it!

stories.story: The villager drank the potion when you were busy. Next time.

The villager, desperate at this point, gulped down the dubious potion.  They attempted to mimic the chirping of a bird, hoping to attract the sprite's attention. Honestly that's a little offensive. Sprites and birds are not the same. You already know this ignorant villager is getting nowhere in the 20th century.
stories.revealText: Birds can imitate humans, so is it really a super power to be able to imitate birds?

stories.story: The villager clutched at straws and drank the potion. The potion empowered them to understand the whispers of the forest. They heard the rustling of leaves and the chattering of squirrels. One particularly talkative squirrel mentioned a hidden clearing guarded by a riddle. The villager, following the squirrel's cryptic clue, ventured deeper into the forest and eventually found the clearing. There, nestled amongst the ferns, was the golden locket! The villager, grateful to the talkative squirrel, retrieved the locket and emerged from the forest victorious.
stories.revealText: Squirrels bad

stories.story: The villager downed the potion. They quickly found out the potion gave the power of invisibility, but that seemed to be the least needed power for them right now. They ventured deeper into the forest. They emerged on the other side, invisible and empty-handed in more ways than one. The locket was nowhere to be found.
stories.revealText: Even if you are an empath, becoming invisible does not help you relate to items that feel invisible.

stories.story: The villager drank the potion, the potion granting them the ability to soar high above the trees. From their aerial vantage point, they spotted a glint of gold amongst the trees. The villager swooped down and retrieved the hidden locket from a hollowed-out log. Soaring through the sky, the villager whooped with joy, relieved to have found their missing treasure.
stories.revealText: It's over. I have the high ground potion.

stories.story: The villager consumed the potion, the potion granting them the ability to make matter. They figured, why not? Perhaps a bridge across the stream would help them reach an unexplored area. They ended up with a small, wobbly bridge that led nowhere new. The locket remained missing.
stories.revealText: With the power to create and destroy matter, we are only limited by our own imaginations.

stories.story: The villager drank the potion, the potion granting them super jumps. They bounced uncontrollably around the trees, knocking over a few birds' nests in the process. The locket hunt, however, remained unsuccessful.
stories.revealText: boioioiing

stories.story: The villager took a swig of the potion. A tiny puff of smoke emerged from the potion bottle. The forest remained silent, and the locket remained missing.
The villager drank the potion and began to commune with the forest flowers. They learned a fascinating fact about the history of photosynthesis, but the locket was nowhere to be found.
stories.revealText: If I already forgot the interesting fact of photosynthesis that the plants talked about, was it ever actually interesting?

stories.story: You heard a loud noise from your crystal ball. Oh right, you were supposed to check in on the villager with the lost locket. By the time you reached the crystal ball to peer into it, all you saw was a slightly embarrassed looking villager.

The villager downed the potion. A mischievous glint entered their eye as they realized the potential of this peculiar concoction. They began weaving a path through the forest, leaving behind a vibrant trail of shimmering blue. Since they were leaving behind a trail, they were no longer getting lost. Finally, they spotted it: a single, perfect blue circle amidst a cluster of ordinary green stains.  Digging beneath the circle, the villager unearthed the golden locket, gleaming in the dappled sunlight. The potion, while unexpected, had proven its worth
stories.revealText: trailblazer is broken

stories.story: The villager, ever hopeful, downed the next potion. They cracked their knuckles and their fingers illuminated the path ahead.  However, their knuckles emitted a faint, sickly green glow that did little to dispel the forest's shadows.  The startled forest creatures, however, seemed to find the glowing knuckles highly offensive.  A barrage of pinecones rained down upon the villager, forcing them to flee back to the village with nothing but bruised shins and a throbbing headache.
stories.revealText: Why speak with your fists when you can light the way with your knuckles. Would that be a good way to advertise my potions?

stories.story: You heard a knock at the door and went over to answer it. Maybe there was someone else asking for another potion. Instead there was a stranger with a worn photograph. The stranger held out the photograph and asked if it belonged to you. You took a look at the photograph that was too worn to be able to see anything. 'No' you said as you closed the door and went to lie down forgetting to look into your crystal ball.

The villager, desperate at this point, downed the potion. They conjured a magical sandstorm that scoured the forest floor. Staring at the sand dunes that had now formed, the villager was even more hopeless.
stories.revealText: Take a lost locket and bury it in sand. Now it's buried treasure. Property value skyrocketing.

stories.story: The villager zipped around from place to place, but could not find anything.
stories.revealText: Honestly you missed when the villager first drank the potion, but this zipping behavior must be a super power.

stories.story: The villager, with a hint of skepticism, drank the potion.  They cleared their throat and belted out a high-pitched note, hoping to impress any nearby sprites with their newfound vocal range.  Nobody was impressed, and there was no reaction. The villager's singing voice remained as average as ever.
stories.revealText: People are so hard to impress nowadays.

stories.story: The villager grasped the vial.  They uncorked it and downed the shimmering liquid with a determined gulp.  Instantly, their mind sharpened.  Details of the forest floor, once blurred, became clear.  They noticed faint animal tracks leading deeper into the woods and subtle changes in the air current, hinting at a hidden entrance.  Following these clues with laser focus, the villager discovered a concealed passage beneath a gnarled tree root.  Crawling through the passage, they emerged into a hidden cavern where the mischievous sprite frolicked, the golden locket dangling from its tiny claw.  Empowered by the potion, the villager devised a clever plan to retrieve the locket, outsmarted the sprite, and emerged victorious.
stories.revealText: Wow this potion really worked for someone!

stories.story: With a hint of trepidation, the villager uncorked the potion. They took a swig, bracing themselves for the change.  A surge of energy coursed through their veins, and their muscles bulged beneath their clothes.  They felt stronger, faster, and more confident than ever before.  Venturing deeper into the forest, the villager effortlessly scaled trees, leaped over streams, and navigated dense undergrowth with newfound ease.  They eventually tracked down the sprite, who was no match for the villager's newfound strength.  With a gentle nudge, the sprite surrendered the locket, impressed by the villager's manliness.
stories.revealText: This potion gives Koenji vibes too

stories.story: The villager felt in-tune with the element of air.  With a whispered command, a gentle breeze swept through the forest, carrying with it the faint sound of tinkling laughter.  Following the sound, the villager located the sprite perched on a high branch, the locket clutched in its tiny hand.  Focusing on the element of wind once more, the villager summoned a gentle gust that lifted them effortlessly into the air.  They retrieved the locket from the surprised sprite and safely descended back to the forest floor.

They uncorked the vial and downed the potion.  Raising their hand towards the sky, they concentrated, picturing a warm, glowing orb.  A ball of light materialized above their palm, illuminating the forest path with an ethereal glow.  The light revealed a series of cryptic symbols carved into the bark of a nearby tree.  Remembering a childhood fascination with ancient languages, the villager deciphered the symbols, leading them to a hidden hollow within the tree trunk.  Inside, nestled amongst soft moss, lay the missing locket.

content: Oh great potion seller, I seek your aid in retrieving the Magic Crystal from the Cave of Wonders. Can you provide me with a potion that will aid me in this perilous journey?

stories.story: The brave adventurer consumed the potion and delved into the cave. With a majestic beard, they commanded respect from the cave dwellers and retrieved the Crystal.
The potion allowed the adventurer to mimic the growls of a cave lion, scaring away smaller creatures and clearing a path to the Crystal chamber.
The potion granted the adventurer the ability to speak with the cave's wise old badger. The badger revealed the location of a secret passage leading directly to the Crystal.
stories.revealText: Badgers are the wisest in the SECRET TUNNEL.

stories.story: The potion rendered the adventurer invisible, allowing them to sneak past the cave's many guardians and reach the Crystal undetected.
The potion allowed the adventurer to soar above the treacherous cave passages and reach the Crystal chamber with ease.
You didn't see anything. Better luck next time.
the potion gave the adventurer the power of super high jumps, allowing them to navigate the cave's many vertical challenges and reach the Crystal.
stories.revealText: Remember doodle jump?

stories.story: Yeah, you didn't see what happened.
The potion allowed the adventurer the power to communicate with the cave moss, which revealed a secret pathway leading directly to the Crystal.
stories.revealText: Moss is so cool and soft. I bet it'd be so fun to talk to moss.

stories.story: You don't know if you want to be around for this one. Especially in a closed, unventilated space like a cave.
The potion left a sticky trail wherever the adventurer went, making it impossible to escape the pursuing cave guardians.
You need to do dishes. It has been too long.
The adventurer drank the potion and Yo Mama caused a minor earthquake, collapsing a section of the cave and blocking the entrance. The adventurer was forced to abandon their quest for the Crystal.
stories.revealText: You're not exactly sure what happened, but you're naming this potion Yo Mama.

stories.story: The potion gave the adventureer the power to form a sandstorm within the cave, burying the Crystal and forcing the adventurer to flee.
The potion granted the adventurer the power of agility and stealth, allowing them to navigate the cave's perilous traps and reach the Crystal undetected.
You missed the events. Better luck next time
You missed the events. Better luck next time
The potion gave the adventurer the power of being super buff and handsome, but alas, the Crystal remained hidden within the heavily guarded chamber.
You missed the events. Better luck next time
You missed the events. Better luck next time
